comment.author: 61766673@N00
comment._content: The car is a 12hp Panhard in which he won the 1000 Mile Trial in 1900.

comment.author: 22081583@N06
comment._content:
This photograph was taken on either 1st or 2nd November 1900 when the Duke and Duchess of York were guests of Lord and Lady Llangattock at their residence at The Hendre.
From left to right in the car are
Sir Charles Cust (1864-1931) was equerry to the Duke of York. The pair had been friends for many years having served together as midshipmen on HMS Bacchante in 1881.
Lord Llangattock
Charles CS Rolls (in his oilskin driving coat)
Duke of York, later King George V.
